items.title: RFK Jr. wants more people wearing health wearables in the name of ‘MAHA’

items.title: Trump’s Big Beautiful Bill will accelerate an American energy crisis—and it could cost the U.S. the AI race
items.description: The megabill just passed by Congress handicaps clean energy when the U.S. needs more power more quickly.

items.title: The next phase of Starbucks’ turnaround plan is offering executives up to $6 million in stock grants, as baristas scrap to get annual raises above 2%
items.description: Baristas reportedly received 2% to 3% pay increases at the end of 2024 following a tough financial year. New CEO Brian Niccol received nearly $100 mil...
